data.name: The Pegasus Expedition Demo
data.short_description: Try your hand at galactic governance in the demo of The Pegasus Expedition, a story-driven sci-fi grand strategy game set in humankind’s darkest hour. Facing an overwhelming threat, humanity sends expeditions to the Pegasus Galaxy in a desperate attempt to find a refuge for the population of Earth.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Fourth Generation Intel Core i5 2.5 Ghz or AMD FX8350 4.0 Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD 7970 or nVidia 770 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
